sentence.Network_en: The man was jowly, unshaven, balding.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个男人长着双下巴，胡子拉碴，快要谢顶了。

sentence.Network_en: a short balding man with glasses
sentence.Network_cn: 戴眼镜的有些秃顶的小个子男人

sentence.Network_en: He wore a straw hat to keep his balding head from getting sunburned.
sentence.Network_cn: 他戴了顶草帽，以免正在谢顶的脑袋被太阳晒到。

entry.tran: 开始变秃的；正在谢顶的
entry.def: Someone who is balding is beginning to lose the hair on the top of their head.

example.ex: He wore a straw hat to keep his balding head from getting sunburned.
example.tran: 他戴了顶草帽，以免正在谢顶的脑袋被太阳晒到。
